metadata.name: The Shitposter #1/5
metadata.description:
This NFT symbolises one of the main antagonists found in the crypto space, renound for sharing their oh so witty humour with the community, or so they think. 

Often posting jokes pertaining to code or the inner most workings of littler understood crypto projects, dropping in acronyms like PoW and arguing why ETH is the best crypto ever whilst drawing up technical comparables to Bitcoin.

Buy yourself a piece of history with this rare, somewhat uncanny resemblance of "The Shitposter".
